name: Suupaa Gureeto Bokkusu
description:
Note: This is a #gbjam game I made in 4 days. It's a gamejam game so there might still be some hidden bugs floating around. Be warned!

Grab all the boxes and kill enemies!

I made this Super Crate Box clone in 4 days for the 4th edition of the #gbjam.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: move/jump
  • X: shoot

Credits:

  • Art + Code + Sounds: PixelArtM
  • Music: Bibiki
